verses.name: Isaiah 17:1
verses.text: The burden of Damascus. Behold, Damascus is taken away from being a city, and it shall be a ruinous heap.

verses.name: Isaiah 17:2
verses.text: The cities of Aroer are forsaken: they shall be for flocks, which shall lie down, and none shall make them afraid.

verses.name: Isaiah 17:3
verses.text: The fortress also shall cease from Ephraim, and the kingdom from Damascus, and the remnant of Syria: they shall be as the glory of the children of Israel, saith the Lord of hosts.
